hard.q: Two siblings stand back-to-back facing opposite directions. They rotate 180 degrees together and still face away. How is this possible?
hard.a: They are facing opposite directions from the start and rotate in place; they never turn toward each other.
hard.hint: Consider orientation and turning in place.
